raw_comment:
I notice the younger people think the world is getting better, older people don't think that is the case.

I wonder why there is no information about ages from 25 to 39. I also wonder why young and old people believe Indonesia is getting better.

This relates to me because everyone I surround myself believes the world is getting better but not everyone believes that.

Title - Old to Young
ace_sentences: I notice that younger people think that the world is getting better.
I notice that older people do not think that the world is getting better.
I wonder why there is no information about ages from 25 to 39.
I wonder why young people believe that Indonesia is getting better.
I wonder why old people believe that Indonesia is getting better.
Everyone that I surround myself with believes that the world is getting better.
Not everyone believes that the world is getting better.
The title is: Old to Young.
